content: *this cute cover will brighten up a standard pencil while it is almost too pretty to use the reality is that pencils get shorter as they are used and sharpened as the pencil shortens push the covering up when that is no longer possible you can move the flower to another pencil lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 80314ad skill level easy level 2 lion® cotton article #760 2 colors 1 ball each crochet hook - size e-4 3 5 mm split ring stitch markers standard pencil worked in rounds petals trumpet finishing requires some construction stem around pencil sewing
